name: DarkGang Finance
description: "DarkGang Finance - the first ecosystem running around an algorithmic token pegged to DARK on Cronos chain Inspired by the most successful algorithmic stablecoin on Fantom: Tomb, and the most prominent algorithmic token project on Cronos: DarkCrypto, DarkGang is an algorithmic stablecoin pegged to the price of 1 DARK via seigniorage. The algorithm helps to increase the supply in event of the deflationary tendency of the token or reduce the supply in event of a decline in purchasing power of the token. Therefore, the supply and demand of the DARKG are balanced which helps to maintain its peg to 1 DARK in the long run. "
